aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.intro: At iCleaning, we believe that quality cleaning of furniture, air conditioners, carpets and more is an expression of respect for space. We started as a small team of professionals seeking to change the perception of surface and air conditioner cleaning in Dubai, and have grown into a full-fledged professional service trusted by private clients, businesses and large companies.
aboutPage.missionText: To provide not just cleanliness, but a feeling of comfort, safety and attention to detail. We use proven methods, modern equipment and eco-friendly products to achieve impeccable results without harm to health or the environment.
aboutPage.approachText1: Every order for us is a separate project. We pay close attention to the features of each object. We always adapt to the client's wishes, whether it's delicate furniture cleaning or deep air conditioner cleaning.
aboutPage.approachText2: Our team consists of trained specialists with work experience and attention to detail. We value trust and always do our work honestly, accurately and on time.
aboutPage.value1Text: We use professional equipment and innovative cleaning methods
aboutPage.value2Text: We use safe, hypoallergenic products without harm to the environment
aboutPage.value3Text: We arrive exactly on time and complete work on schedule
aboutPage.value4Text: We are confident in the result - if something is not right, we will come back and fix it
aboutPage.value5Text: Transparent pricing without hidden fees and surcharges
aboutPage.value6Text: Always in touch, ready to answer questions and help with service selection
aboutPage.closingText: You get comfort, reliability and a modern approach. We are proud that we are recommended to friends and cooperate with us on a permanent basis!
contactPage.title: Contact
contactPage.intro: At iCleaning, we believe that cleanliness is not only about order, but also about reliability. That's why we are always open to communication and ready to answer any of your questions — whether it's a one-time service, a subscription, or urgent carpet cleaning. Contact us in a way that is convenient for you — by phone, email, or messengers.
contactPage.phoneHours: (Calls and WhatsApp available daily from 8:00 AM to 10:00 PM)
contactPage.emailDescription: (Quick responses to all questions about orders, subscriptions and offers)
contactPage.addressText: Shop #10, Jebel Ali Industrial Area, Dubai, UAE
contactPage.addressNote: (We do not accept visitors without prior appointment — please clarify details in advance).
contactPage.socialTitle: Support in messengers and social networks
contactPage.socialSubtitle: For your convenience, we are available on popular communication channels:
contactPage.whatsappDesc: instant responses, before/after photos, appointment scheduling
contactPage.instagramDesc: follow our work, promotions and news
contactPage.telegramDesc: quick chat and reminders about your orders
contactPage.socialFooter: Subscribe and stay updated on news, promotions and useful tips!
contactPage.closingTitle: We are waiting for you — any day of the week!
contactPage.closingText: Whether it's emergency furniture cleaning before guests arrive or regular fabric care — we are here. Leave a request through the website, call or write to us in a messenger, and we will offer the best solution for your task.
contactPage.closingTagline: iCleaning — your home care starts with us!
modal.title: Get a Free Quote
equipment.ecoDesc: We use only environmentally friendly and hypoallergenic cleaning products that contain no harmful chemicals. Safe for people, pets, and the environment while maintaining high effectiveness.
equipment.proDesc: We use modern steam vacuum cleaners, rotary carpet machines, professional HEPA vacuums, and specialized upholstery cleaning equipment.
team.reason1Desc: All employees are trained and work according to strict quality standards.
team.reason2Desc: Professional equipment and safe chemicals from leading brands.
team.reason3Desc: We care about the health of our clients and minimize our impact on the environment.
team.reason4Desc: Favorable rates for those who want cleaning surfaces and more to become an unnoticeable routine.
team.reason5Desc: Select the required service and time in a couple of clicks directly from the website.
footer.brandDesc: Crafting meaningful designs that blend creativity, usability, and impact.
footer.address2: Store #10, Jebel Ali Industrial Area - Dubai - UAE
servicePage.notFoundDesc: The service you're looking for doesn't exist.
carpet.sizesSubtitle: Transparent pricing for your carpet cleaning needs
carpet.ourTeam: Our team will come and measure the carpet for you
carpet.beforeDesc: Before you entrust your carpet or carpeting to our team of professionals for cleaning, it looks something like this.
carpet.afterDesc: After our meticulous work, your carpet will look like this. Is it magic? No, it's our team of professionals.
carpet.materialsSubtitle: Each fiber requires its own processing method. Here's how we approach working with different types of carpets:
carpet.pureWoolDesc: Wool carpets are durable and warm, but sensitive to aggressive chemicals and humidity. We use soft compounds that protect the structure of the fibers and maintain their elasticity. Particular attention is paid to removing stains without deforming the product.
carpet.cottonDesc: Practical and soft. We use deep washing and delicate drying techniques to preserve the shape and color saturation. Especially relevant for rugs in children's and pet areas.
carpet.silkDesc: A luxurious material that requires precision. We use specialized dry cleaning to protect the shine and smoothness. Contact with hot water and mechanical friction are not allowed.
carpet.linenDesc: Natural and breathable material. We clean such carpets manually, using only gentle compounds. Air drying and avoiding aggressive brushes are the key to preserving the texture.
carpet.polyesterDesc: Resistant to stains and wear, ideal for high traffic areas. We machine clean with minimal moisture exposure, preserving the shape and original appearance.
carpet.woolDesc: This wool rug is durable and naturally stain-resistant, making it a perfect and stylish choice for any home. Its resilient fibers resist spills, allowing for easier cleaning. Regular vacuuming and occasional professional cleaning will preserve its appearance and longevity.
carpet.videoTitle: Carpet cleaning is an investment in comfort!
carpet.benefit1: Improve air quality by removing allergens.
carpet.benefit2: Eliminates pet odors and kitchen fumes.
carpet.benefit3: Reduces the risk of damage to the coating from old stains.
carpet.benefit4: Extends the service life of carpets by 2-3 times.
carpet.benefit5: Bring back rich color and texture.
carpet.videoNote: In the video you can see in detail what work we do to return your carpets to their former appearance.
carpet.handmadeDesc1: Here, not only cleanliness is important, but also the preservation of the uniqueness of the product. We carry out delicate cleaning without deformation, loss of color and risks for the carpet base. Each such order is considered individually - with preliminary diagnostics and selection of the method.
carpet.handmadeDesc2: We are true professionals in our field, but we cannot guarantee 100% removal of absolutely any stains. There are various types of contamination, when we can only provide lightening of stains, but not their complete removal.
sofa.intro: Regular cleaning of sofas and mattresses is not just a matter of aesthetics, but the key to the health and comfort of the whole family. Our team of professionals offers comprehensive services for cleaning sofas and mattresses using eco-friendly, hypoallergenic products. We remove not only visible stains, but also deeply ingrained dirt, bacteria and odors, returning your furniture to freshness and presentable appearance.
sofa.beforeDesc: Before you entrust your sofa or mattress to our team of professionals for cleaning, it looks something like this.
sofa.afterDesc: After thorough work, your sofa will look like this. Is this magic? No, it's our team of professionals.
sofa.catalogSubtitle: Forget about inconveniences: we will come at a time convenient for you and carefully carry out the entire process on site - without noise, chemical odors and unnecessary hassle. After our cleaning, you will not recognize your sofa - it will look like new, and sleeping on a fresh mattress will become much more pleasant.
sofa.standardIntro: We offer comprehensive cleaning of chairs and armchairs, which includes:
sofa.standardPoint1: cleaning of seats, backs, armrests and decorative elements;
sofa.standardPoint2: treatment of stains and complex dirt;
sofa.standardPoint3: restoration of freshness and color of upholstery;
sofa.standardConclusion: Furniture cleaning helps not only to improve the appearance, but also to extend its service life. The service is ideal for both home furniture and office settings or restaurant interiors, where it is especially important to maintain cleanliness and neatness.
sofa.chairsIntro: We offer comprehensive cleaning of chairs and armchairs, which includes:
sofa.chairsPoint1: cleaning of seats, backs, armrests and decorative elements;
sofa.chairsPoint2: treatment of stains and complex dirt;
sofa.chairsPoint3: restoration of freshness and color of upholstery;
sofa.chairsConclusion: Furniture cleaning helps not only to improve the appearance, but also to extend its service life. The service is ideal for both home furniture and office settings or restaurant interiors, where it is especially important to maintain cleanliness and neatness.
sofa.leatherPoint1: gentle cleaning of the surface from dust and dirt;
sofa.leatherPoint2: stain removal without damaging the leather texture;
sofa.leatherPoint3: application of conditioner for nourishment and protection of the material;
sofa.leatherPoint4: final polishing to restore shine and elasticity.
sofa.leatherConclusion: After our treatment, the leather becomes soft, well-groomed, pleasant to the touch - without greasy shine and unpleasant smell. The sofa looks dignified and stylish, as on the day of purchase.
curtains.intro: Regular cleaning of curtains and blinds helps keep them fresh always, extend their service life and improve indoor air quality. At iCleaning we offer professional cleaning of all types of curtains and blinds — on-site or at our facility.
curtains.factoryDesc: If items need deep dry cleaning, we carefully dismantle them, deliver to our factory where we carry out a full cycle of professional cleaning. After that, we return and reinstall them. This approach is especially effective for dense fabrics, heavy soiling, or long periods without care.
curtains.complexDesc: Regardless of the format — we remove dust, dirt, stains, and odors. Working with various types of curtains and blinds, we select individual products that preserve color, structure, and shape of the material.
curtains.onsiteDesc: For urgent or delicate cleaning, our specialists will come to your home or office. They will process curtains and blinds right on the windows, without dismantling. This is convenient, fast, and safe for most fabrics and structures.
curtains.typesTitle: WE CLEAN ALL TYPES OF CURTAINS & BLINDS
curtains.textileDesc: Careful cleaning of fabric coverings from household dust and odors while preserving texture.
curtains.woodenDesc: We use gentle and safe products so as not to damage the wood surface.
curtains.plasticDesc: We remove deposits and dirt from horizontal and vertical slats, including fixtures.
curtains.rollerDesc: Roller blinds are made from a single piece of fabric that folds up and down around a cylindrical tube when raised. This tube is usually mounted at the top of the window frame.
curtains.classicDesc: Classic textile curtains consist of fabric panels that hang vertically from a rod or track. They can be opened or closed to control lighting, privacy, and temperature.
curtains.romanDesc: Roman blinds are made from a single piece of fabric that folds up and down into pleats when raised. When raising the blinds, the fabric compresses evenly with horizontal folds, creating a smooth and tailored look.
curtains.whyTitle: WHY IS IT IMPORTANT TO REGULARLY CLEAN CURTAINS & BLINDS?
curtains.whySubtitle: There are a whole range of reasons:
curtains.benefit1Desc: Reduces the amount of dust, allergens, and bacteria in the air.
curtains.benefit2Desc: Regular cleaning prevents the appearance of mold and unpleasant odors.
curtains.benefit3Desc: Care extends the service life of curtains — no need for frequent replacement.
curtains.benefit4Desc: Clean windows make the interior more well-maintained and fresh.
curtains.benefit5Desc: Cleaning helps improve the microclimate in the room.
curtains.videoDesc: Regular cleaning of curtains and blinds is necessary to maintain a fresh and healthy atmosphere in the room. Our team of professionals specializes in providing high-quality curtain and blind cleaning services, ensuring thorough removal of dust, dirt, and allergens. Thanks to our effective processes and attention to detail, we achieve quick results without compromising quality. Trust us to refresh your curtains and blinds, improving the appearance and cleanliness of your home or office.
curtains.beforeDesc: Everyday life/work and dust on your blinds — this is what your windows usually look like before we arrive.
curtains.afterDesc: This is what your blinds and space look like after our thorough work. Our team consists of true professionals.
regular.heroTitle: Cleaning is not just about order, but about comfort, health and atmosphere
regular.heroDesc: At iCleaning, we offer two main formats: regular and deep cleaning. Both options are performed by a professional team using eco-friendly products and modern equipment.
regular.sizesSubtitle: Transparent pricing based on your space size
aircon.heroTitle: Regular Air Conditioner Cleaning — Your Key to Fresh, Clean, and Safe Air
regular.detailsDesc: This format is perfect for those who want a clean home or office at all times, but don't have time to do it themselves. We take on all the basic tasks to ensure your space is always neat and fresh.
regular.step1Desc: We arrange items and organize your space.
regular.step2Desc: We wipe all horizontal surfaces: shelves, countertops, windowsills.
regular.step3Desc: We clean carpets, rugs, and upholstered furniture from dust, wool, and debris.
regular.step4Desc: We carefully sweep and mop hard floors, including tiles and laminate.
regular.step5Desc: We clean sinks, toilets, shower stalls, appliances, and disinfect key areas.
regular.scheduleInfo: Regular cleaning can be scheduled individually: once a week, twice, or more often — depending on your needs. And if you subscribe to 4 visits per month, you'll receive a favorable discount.
regular.lightCleaningDesc: We help with basic organizing and tidying so that your home looks neat and orderly.
regular.trashRemovalDesc: General cleaning includes wiping all accessible surfaces, including tables, countertops and shelves, to remove dust and small stains.
regular.surfaceDisinfectionDesc: General cleaning includes wiping all accessible surfaces, including tables, countertops and shelves, to remove dust and small stains.
regular.floorSweepingDesc: Hard floors are carefully swept and mopped to maintain their cleanliness and shine. We pay special attention to removing dirt and stains to ensure flawless floors and extend their lifespan.
regular.vacuumDustingDesc: General cleaning includes regular dust removal from surfaces, furniture, and decor. We vacuum carpets and hard floors to maintain cleanliness and prevent dust in the room.
regular.bathroomKitchenDesc: We maintain cleanliness in bathrooms and kitchens, regularly cleaning surfaces, sinks, countertops, and appliances, as well as disinfecting actively used areas.
regular.deepKitchenDesc: We thoroughly clean kitchen appliances, both inside and outside, including ovens, microwaves, and refrigerators. Cabinets, countertops, and back panels are carefully cleaned from grease and grime.
regular.floorCareDesc: All types of floor coverings, including parquet, tiles, and laminate, are cleaned with specialized equipment that improves their appearance and protects the finish, extending their lifespan.
regular.sensitiveAreasDesc: Special attention is given to sensitive surfaces such as door handles, light switches, and remote controls to reduce the spread of microbes and ensure a healthier living environment.
regular.comprehensiveSurfaceDesc: Deep cleaning goes beyond regular dusting. We thoroughly clean each surface in your home, including hard-to-reach areas such as baseboards, lights, and ceiling fans.
regular.windowBlindsDesc: We thoroughly clean windows both inside and outside, ensuring ideal glass transparency. We also clean sills and tracks, removing dirt and dust to ensure complete cleanliness and freshness in your space.
regular.bathroomDisinfectionDesc: Bathrooms require thorough deep cleaning of tiles, grout, and all plumbing fixtures. We disinfect and clean shower cabins, baths, toilets, and sinks, ensuring flawless cleanliness and preventing mold and plaque.
regular.ctaDesc: Let our professional team take care of your home or office. Book your cleaning service today!
aircon.heroDesc1: In the hot climate of the UAE, air conditioners work practically around the clock, accumulating dust, dirt, mold, and allergens inside. All of this poses an invisible threat to your health and air quality.
aircon.heroDesc2: The iCleaning team provides comprehensive air conditioner cleaning services for all types: from split systems and window units to cassette and industrial systems. We work with residential properties, offices, hotels, and commercial spaces. Using professional disinfecting agents, modern washing technologies, and powerful tools to restore the effectiveness and hygiene of your system.
aircon.feature1: Complete disassembly and cleaning of all components
aircon.typesSubtitle: We offer three levels of service — depending on the degree of contamination and type of space:
aircon.deepDesc: Recommended if the air conditioner runs daily or hasn't been serviced.
aircon.deepTime: Our team's working time: from 1 hour.
aircon.standardDesc: Ideal for apartments and offices with normal load:
aircon.standardTime: Specialist working time: 30-60 minutes per unit.
aircon.industrialDesc: Suitable for restaurants, hotels, warehouses, and large facilities:
aircon.industrialPoint1: Cleaning of large ventilation and air conditioning systems;
aircon.industrialPoint2: Removal of grease, smoke, and contaminants;
aircon.chooseSubtitle: Who and which cleaning is suitable for:
aircon.choose1: Apartment residents are suited to standard or deep cleaning 1-3 times per year.
aircon.choose2: Families with children and pets should choose deep cleaning every 4-6 months.
aircon.choose3: Offices and beauty salons should have regular cleaning to maintain sanitary standards.
aircon.choose4: Cafes, restaurants, and hotels — industrial cleaning is mandatory according to established schedules.
aircon.chooseHelp: If you're unsure which option to choose, simply send us a photo of your air conditioner and we'll recommend the best solution for your situation.
aircon.priceTitle: We Have an Updated Price List
aircon.priceDesc: For an accurate service cost, simply contact us via WhatsApp, and we will promptly send you the information. Also, you can arrange a specialist visit — they will inspect the equipment, select the right type of cleaning, and perform the work immediately.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: iCleaning operates https://icleaning.ae (the Site) and its pages on various social networks. On this page you will learn about our policy regarding the collection, use and disclosure of personal information that we receive from users of the Site and our social media pages.
privacy.usage: We use your personal information only to provide you with services. By using the Site and our social media pages, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.
terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.condition1: In case the carpets were not checked upon delivery, the client has 3 days to file a complaint. If the complaint is not filed on time, iCleaning will not be responsible for responding to any complaints.
terms.condition2: Carpets whose labels indicate incomplete/inaccurate care information will be washed in accordance with standard procedures applicable to the material from which the carpet is made. Although the Company will make every effort, it is not responsible for the result of applying standard carpet washing procedures.
terms.condition3: Although the company will make every effort to remove any stains, this does not guarantee their complete removal, especially stains that have eaten into the carpet fibers after previous washes.
terms.condition4: After cleaning carpets, minor changes in color and texture may occur.
terms.condition5: The client is warned that any existing damage, defects or pulls may worsen as a result of washing, and the Company is not responsible for such problems, even if they are exaggerated.

equipment.hepaDesc: Capture finest dust particles and allergens for healthier air quality
equipment.steamDesc: Deep cleaning and sanitization without harsh chemicals
equipment.upholsteryDesc: Professional cleaning for carpets, furniture, removing stains and odors

testimonials.title: What our
testimonials.subtitle: We take pride in the quality of our services and satisfied customers
testimonials.person1Text: Excellent work! My sofa looks like new. The team was professional and courteous. Will definitely order again!
testimonials.person2Text: Very satisfied with the result. The carpet was in terrible condition, but they did an excellent job. Fast, quality work at a reasonable price.
testimonials.person3Text: Professional approach to work. The air conditioner now works much better, the air is cleaner. I recommend it to everyone!
testimonials.person4Text: Wonderful service! The curtains came back after cleaning in perfect condition. The staff is polite, the work was done on time.
